Module worldofzuul
Package worldofzuul.util

Class Drawing

java.lang.Object
worldofzuul.util.Drawing
public class Drawing
extends java.lang.Object
The type Drawing. Contains static functions used to assist in drawing.

  • Method Details

    • translate

      public static javafx.animation.TranslateTransition translate​(javafx.scene.Node node, double x, double y, double z, int translationTime)
      Translate transition. Translates the position of a node to the given parameters, param x, param y, param z, while delaying the process by the time given by the translation time.
      Parameters:
      node - the node to move
      x - the x
      y - the y
      z - the z
      translationTime - the time in milliseconds for the transition to take
      Returns:
      the translate transition

    • drawGrid

      public static void drawGrid​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane, double rowCount)
      Draw grid. Draws a cube grid over the pane given a set amount of rows
      Parameters:
      pane - the pane
      rowCount - the row count

    • setNodePositionToVectorCorner

      public static void setNodePositionToVectorCorner​(javafx.scene.Node node, Vector position, double tileDim)
      Sets node position to vector corner. Sets the position of a node to be in the corner of a cube defined by the given tile dimensions.
      Parameters:
      node - the node to reposition
      position - the position
      tileDim - the tile dim

    • drawGameObjects

      public static void drawGameObjects​(Room room, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​javafx.scene.image.Image> loadedImages, javafx.scene.layout.Pane roomPane, double backgroundTileDim, java.lang.Class<?> callerController, Vector clickedPos, boolean highlight)
      Draw game objects. Adds ImageViews to places that need it in the pane node as defined in {the room. If the highlight boolean is true then rectangles with different colored strokes will be added to highlight individual GameObjects.
      Parameters:
      room - the room
      loadedImages - the loaded images
      roomPane - the room pane
      backgroundTileDim - the background tile dim
      callerController - the JavaFX caller controller
      clickedPos - the clicked pos
      highlight - the highlight

    • appendFieldInfoBar

      private static void appendFieldInfoBar​(Field field, javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane, Vector position, double tileDim, java.lang.Class<?> callerController)
      Append field info bar. Adds a new instance of a FieldInfoBarController node to the pane node at the given position.
      Parameters:
      field - the field that is to be described by FieldInfoBarController
      pane - the pane
      position - the position to add the new node at
      tileDim - the tile dim
      callerController - the JavaFX caller controller

    • drawGameObjectImage

      private static void drawGameObjectImage​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​javafx.scene.image.Image> loadedImages, javafx.scene.layout.Pane roomPane, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rect, GameObject object)
      Draw game object image. Adds an ImageView to the pane node using the one defined in the GameObject if one exists there, else a new one will be created and added to both.
      Parameters:
      loadedImages - the loaded images
      roomPane - the room pane
      rect - the rect
      object - the object

    • loadFieldInfoBar

      private static javafx.scene.Node loadFieldInfoBar​(Field field, java.lang.Class<?> callerController)
      Load field info bar node.
      Parameters:
      field - the field
      callerController - the caller controller
      Returns:
      the node
